ygData.subject: Re: The retreat
ygData.msgSnippet: Speedbreaker stops all of a sudden, not gradually, he just puts on the breaks, and skids hard. When he is finally done skiding he is right beside the base.

Subject: Re: The retreat
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Speedbreaker stops all of a sudden, not gradually, he just puts on the
breaks, and skids hard. When he is finally done skiding he is right beside
the base. "Thank you for choosing Speedbreaker transports, exits are to the
back the front, ah hell, all around the vehicle. Make sure to tell your
friends about it" he comments jokingly.
